snippet.title: Dune: Spice Wars - Multiplayer Trailer
snippet.description:
There has never been a better time to lure friends in with promises of spice, then see who the desert takes first. In today’s update, take the reins of either the Atreides, Harkonnen, Fremen, or Smugglers in matches of up to four players. Any open spots can be filled with AI-controlled factions ranging in difficulty from easy to insane, and each game can be tailored to suit preferences, including map size and sandworm, storm, and Sietch activity. Control the spice, control the universe.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1605220/Dune_Spice_Wars/
Discord: https://discord.gg/qWDe4ng9FE
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DuneSpiceWars
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DuneSpiceWars
